title: Chicago 16 (XVI)
description:
Full Moon Records decided they could release this album if Chicago put up the cash for its production, which they did.  Add producer David Foster and Bill Champlin and you have a dynamite formula.  Champlin was the kind of experienced musician they needed.  The result was Chicago 16, their return to prominence, marked by a #1 single.  Another album where there isn&#039;t a bad song.  Period.

This album contains:


What You&#039;re Missing

Waiting For You to Decide

Bad Advice

Chains

Hard to Say I&#039;m Sorry/Get Away

Follow Me

Sonny Think Twice

What Can I Say

Rescue You

Love Me Tomorrow

Daddy&#039;s Favorite Fool
